Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #Death Mountain Trail#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a spider high #above the icy waters# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that arbitrary code execution leads to the credits sequence.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #an Ocarina# can be found at #the Graveyard#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Forest Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Map of the Spirit Temple# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: The single rupee is a unique item.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #Saria's Song#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Ice Cavern# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Stick#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that Lon Lon Ranch prospered under Ingo.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found at #the Market#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #an Ocarina# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Bottom of the Well# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #an Ice Trap#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Bombs (10 pieces)# can be found at #Death Mountain Crater#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Shadow Temple# hoards #Ruto's Letter#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Slingshot#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Stone of Agony# can be found at #Hyrule Field#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #treasure thrown by Princess Zelda# is #an Ice Trap#.
